attributes.action: Mandatory SEND Qualifications for School Staff Supporting SEND Students
attributes.additional_details: Provide general training in basic SEND. Allocate funding for schools to provide appropriate training for staff. Allocate funding for agencies to provide training for staff.
attributes.background: Require specific qualifications in Special Educational Needs and Disabilities (SEND) in order to work with children with SEND in schools. This includes contracted school staff and agency support staff. If currently working with SEND, school to provide appropriate training.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700700
